page.title: 12COLESHILL SCHOOL
page.content: Earl Howe and some friends built the school in 1840.Originaly it was 2 schools,infants, and pupils up to 14 years. Part of the school used to be the schoolmaster's house _ 1 room upstairs and 1 down.You can clearly see all the changes made to the building,and also marks on the bricks in the porch made by pupils sharpening their slate pencils. Once there were about 100 pupils in the school,now there are 24,and 7 of them come to our school in the Autumn, as it is now only a first school.Ten of our class went to this school. The headmisstress,Miss Dollimore,works there full-time,but she is never alone because another teacher,a welfare assisstant and secretary all work partime. Every child has a school dinner.
